decks.notes: This deck focuses on generating a large amount of mana through fast mana artifacts like Mana Vault, Sol Ring, and Moxen, while utilizing card draw spells like Brainstorm and Paradoxical Outcome to draw into combo pieces. The goal is to quickly assemble a powerful board state, using cards like LÃ³rien Revealed and Thundertrap Trainer to disrupt opponents and protect the combo. By efficiently generating mana and drawing cards, the deck aims to win the game through a powerful combo turn or overwhelming opponents with a combination of spells and creatures.

The deck focuses on using cards like Stinkweed Imp, Golgari Thug, and Bazaar of Baghdad to enable the Dredge mechanic, filling the graveyard with cards like Narcomoeba and Prized Amalgam. Through a combination of self-mill and graveyard recursion effects, the deck aims to quickly fill the board with creatures like Ichorid and Hollow One, while also disrupting opponents with cards like Force of Will and Grief. The end goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a powerful board state and close out the game with cards like Creeping Chill and Silversmote Ghoul.
